byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Newport, R I, fireworks display to aid war victims
snippet: NEWPORT, R.I., Sept. 1--There was considerable activity in the Summer colony today because of the approach of Labor Day. Many turned out this afternoon for the Gay Nineties parade on Bellevue Avenue, of which Mrs. W. Gurnee...

headline.main: 'GAY 90'S' PARADE HELD IN NEWPORT; Patriotic Fireworks Display Is Also Given as a Benefit for War Relief Work RESORT SCENE OF PARTIES Beverly Bogerts, Miss Julia A. Berwind and Mrs. Verner Z. Reed Jr. Entertain
